name: nijjara-erp
description: Nijjara ERP Google Apps Script Project

scripts.push:both: npm run push && npm run push:git
scripts.save: git add . && git commit -m 'WIP' && npm run deploy
scripts.status:
git status && echo '
--- Clasp Status ---' && clasp status || echo 'Clasp not logged in or configured'
scripts.setup:
echo 'Setting up Nijjara ERP...' && npm install && echo '
Next steps:' && echo '1. Run: clasp login (to authenticate with Google)' && echo '2. Run: clasp create --type standalone --title "Nijjara ERP" (if new project)' && echo '3. Run: clasp push (to push code to Apps Script)' && echo '4. Configure Git: git config credential.helper store' && echo '5. Run: npm run deploy (to sync everything)'
scripts.deploy:web:new: npx clasp version && npx clasp deploy -d "Create new Web App deployment" && npx clasp deployments

author: Nijjara ERP
